## DesignSystemProvider.designSystemProperties property

Track all design system property names so we can react to changes in those properties. Do not initialize or it will clobber value stored by the decorator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
designSystemProperties: {
        [propertyName: string]: Required<Pick<DecoratorDesignSystemPropertyConfiguration, "cssCustomProperty" | "default">>;
    };
```
